The researcher is the Almighty: You are promising to happen the answer to the division, and the meaning is that you are promising from the coming of the day of resurrection to the weakers of the one who came down, and he said: Good and evil for occurrence.And those who say the first interpretation of the one who said that these verses are the signs of the Day of Resurrection, and it indicated that what is meant by this verse is the one who is the same This day.
